howToUseSection.title: How to Use the Perm Filter – Easy, Fast & Fun with Hairstyle AI
howToUseSection.description: Transform your look with our step-by-step guide. It's simple, quick, and fun to try different perm styles with Hairstyle AI!

steps.title: Step 1: Upload Your Photo
steps.description: To begin, upload a clear image of yourself where your face is visible. Make sure the photo is in JPG, PNG, or JPEG format, and the size doesn't exceed 3MB. This is the first step in transforming your hairstyle with the AI-powered Perm Filter!

steps.title: Step 2: Choose Your Style & Perm Filter
steps.description: Once your photo is uploaded, select the "Perm Filter" from the available options. You can also experiment with different hair colors to match your personal style. After selecting, simply click the "Generate" button and let Hairstyle AI work its magic.

steps.title: Step 3: Wait for Your New Hairstyle
steps.description: Sit tight for about one minute while Hairstyle AI analyzes your photo. The system will automatically apply the perm effect to your hair, making it look realistic and stylish. You can track the process while it works to give you the best result.

steps.title: Step 4: Download and Share Your New Look
steps.description: Once the perm effect is applied, your new hairstyle is ready! You can download the image and share it with friends on social media like Instagram or Snapchat. Show off your new look and enjoy your bold, trendy transformation!

textContent: Looking for a fun way to spice up your social media feed or prank your friends? Why not surprise them with a virtual perm transformation? Hairstyle changer lets you try out a new perm and share the results on Instagram, TikTok, or Snapchat.

I decided to give it a go recently—tried a cute, curly bob with the perm filter, and posted it on Instagram. My friends totally didn't see it coming! One of them commented, "Wow, you look so much softer!" and I couldn't help but smile. It really changed my whole vibe—what was once a more serious, polished look turned into something warm and playful. The best part? I didn't even have to commit to the change. ctaSections.title: Preparing for Special Events ：Parties or Holidays
textContent: Got an upcoming party or celebration? The Perm Filter can help you find the perfect style for your special day. Try out a chic, voluminous perm and impress your friends with your fabulous new look.

faqConfig.question: What would I look like with a perm filter?
faqConfig.answer: The "Perm Filter" lets you visualize how you'd look with a perm hairstyle without any commitment. You can try different curly styles to see how they suit your face shape. It's a fun, no-risk way to experiment and discover the perfect curly look for you.

faqConfig.question: Is the perm filter free to use?
faqConfig.answer: Yes, Hairstyle AI's perm filter is completely free to use. You can try as many perm styles as you like without any charge. There are no hidden fees, so you can enjoy experimenting with your look as much as you want!

faqConfig.question: Is my photo safe when using the perm filter?
faqConfig.answer: Absolutely! Your photo is safe when using Hairstyle AI. We do not store any of your images, and once you're done using the perm filter, your photo is automatically deleted. We value your privacy, ensuring your data remains secure and confidential.

faqConfig.question: What other perm filters can I try?
faqConfig.answer: In addition to the classic perm looks, Hairstyle AI offers a variety of perm filters in different styles, including voluminous curls, soft waves, and curly bobs. Each filter is customizable to match your desired look and can be adjusted to suit your hair type or preference.

faqConfig.question: How realistic are the perm filter results?
faqConfig.answer: Hairstyle AI's perm filter uses advanced AI technology to create highly realistic results. The filter analyzes your facial features and hair texture to apply perm effects that look natural and authentic. You'll get a true-to-life preview of how you'd look with a perm hairstyle.

faqConfig.question: Can I try different perm styles and colors together?
faqConfig.answer: Yes! Hairstyle AI allows you to experiment with both perm styles and different hair colors simultaneously. You can try various combinations to find the perfect look that matches your personal style and preferences.

faqConfig.question: How long does it take to generate a perm filter result?
faqConfig.answer: The perm filter typically takes about one minute to process your photo and generate realistic results. Our AI technology works quickly to analyze your features and apply the perm effect while maintaining high quality and accuracy.

faqConfig.question: What file formats are supported for photo uploads?
faqConfig.answer: Hairstyle AI's perm filter supports JPG, PNG, and JPEG file formats. Make sure your photo is clear, shows your face well, and doesn't exceed 3MB in size for the best results.
